text: Definitely before march. It may go up and down a little but it’s a very good pick.

Market closed but yes buy bro, there is no questioning it won’t pass $2. Like literally no one who knows about the company will say it’s not gonna pass $2, it’s a great company but the whole coronavirus thing caused it to dip, just like all other stocks. Of course, you should do you own research as well! But VBIV is the only stock I’m 99.9999% positive about at the moment.
